title: Creating Plots With Different Scales
description: In this lab, you will learn how to create plots with different scales in Python using Matplotlib. Specifically, you will learn how to create two plots on the same axes with different left and right scales.

meta.title: Python Matplotlib | Data Visualization | Dual-Scale Plots
